inlineContent.text: How much does your intention driving something you do shape that thing? When you create something with the intention of being generous is a better something created than if your intention was for profit? If you take a picture to treasure yourself will it be better than one you take to show off and impress others?

More importantly, how does it shape you? Our brain constantly optimizes itself for the world around us and much of the world around us is one we create. Are you creating a worse you through your intentions?

abstract.text: David Brunow, known as Brunow [ˈbɹunoʊ] to the folks he works with, is a human living on Earth. You might have something in common with him — if you think it is ridiculous that he is talking about himself in the first person here, so does he.
